header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 78A*: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, after “health,” insert “spiritual and”
78B*: Clause 1, page 2, line 5, at end insert “including the individual’s beliefs, values and past practices in respect of the individual’s care”
82A*: Clause 3, page 4, line 7, at end insert—

“(5) The duty of a local authority to exercise its functions with a view to ensuring the integration of care and support provision with health provision and health-related provision shall not include the provision of medical assessment or treatment of any kind contrary to the wishes of an adult with capacity.”

text.IndentOne: “(d) for the purposes of paragraph (b) the term “abuse or neglect” shall not be construed so as to presume, prima facie, abuse or neglect where an adult with capacity refuses medical treatment of any kind.”

text.quote: 106*: Clause 111, page 89, line 36, at end insert—
“( ) Before enactment of Part 1, the Secretary of State must ask the Office for Budget Responsibility to complete by the end of 2014 a review of the funding of adult social care that assesses—
text.IndentOne: (a) the adequacy of current public funding of these services;
(b) the proposals for funding the provisions in this Act; and
(c) the implications of the Act and its funding for the NHS over the next five years.”
